plugin.name: Comment Generator
plugin.description:
This plugin adds a convenient 'Generate Comment' action to the context menu when right-clicking on a file. Upon selecting the action, it automatically generates and adds documentation comments to methods and functions in the file by calling the Gemini API.

For the first-time setup, users will be prompted to enter their API key, which can be stored and later updated through the plugin‚Äôs settings page.

Key Benefits:

  • Automatically generates Javadoc-style comments for methods and functions in your code.
  • Prompted for an API key upon first use, with easy API key management through the settings page.
  • Simplifies the process of adding documentation, improving code readability and maintainability.

This plugin streamlines the process of adding documentation to your code with minimal effort.

plugin.name: Test Cases Generator
plugin.description: Effortlessly generate unit test cases for Kotlin functions with this plugin. It analyzes function parameters, return types, and behavior to create well-structured test cases, ensuring comprehensive coverage. Supports functions inside classes, objects, and standalone files while preventing duplicate test generation.
plugin.change-notes:
• Added support for Kotlin K2 mode, ensuring compatibility with the latest Kotlin analysis engine.
  • Defined maximum supported IntelliJ version (until-build), ensuring proper compatibility across IDE versions.
